PadSplit Host Brittany and her husband Derek discovered an opportunity when the pandemic disrupted the short-term rental market.

💡"Converting our short-term rentals to PadSplits was an easy and natural shift," Brittany reveals. This decision aligned perfectly with their mission: providing quality, affordable housing in Atlanta.⁠
⁠
The transition yielded impressive results.📈 Now managing 11 PadSplit properties with a remarkable 96% average occupancy rate, Brittany has found a model that offers stability and purpose. PadSplit ensures steady cashflow and simplifies property management compared to their previous short-term rental operations.⁠
⁠
"I love being associated with a company that truly cares," Brittany says about PadSplit. This partnership allows her to balance profitable real estate investing with meaningful community impact, all while juggling family life with three young children.⁠
⁠
For property owners seeking to maximize investments while contributing to affordable housing solutions, PadSplit offers a compelling option. It's not just about returns; it's about creating sustainable, accessible living spaces in our communities.🏡⁠
